mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.sort_column as "sortColumn", a.sort_type as "sortType", a.id_strategy as "idStrategy", a.logic_column as "logicColumn", a.package_name as "packageName", a.form_style as "formStyle", a.show_checkbox as "showCheckbox", a.enable_pagination as "enablePagination", a.enable_swagger as "enableSwagger", a.enable_server_valid as "enableServerValid", a.column_config as "columnConfig"
